dafr 0.0.1

Set a seed both in Julia and R

Source: R/utils.R
set_seed.Rd

Set a seed both in Julia and R

Usage

set_seed(seed)

Arguments

seed

seed to be used

Value

No return value, called for side effects.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
## Needs previous call to `setup_daf` which is time
## consuming and requires Julia
setup_daf(installJulia = TRUE, seed = 123)
set_seed(123)
} # }
